details: To help ease the process, we identified 75 of our favorite medical blogs everyone in the field can learn from. details: The well-known health website has quite a collection of blogs,we identified 75 of our favorite medical blogs everyone in the field can. but WebMD Doctors stands out for how relatable it is. Each post is penned by a physician, and the topics can be about parenting, heart medication, or how even health professionals struggle with healthy eating.
